New Records: Shohei Ohtani became the first player in major league history to achieve 50 home runs and 50 stolen bases in a season
Post-Match Reflections: Shohei Ohtani unanimously wins his third MVP award, and first with the Dodgers

Dodgers fans looking for a chant to accompany him when he is welcomed home Friday now have one. It is a chant this town reserves for only the best and most beloved. Kobe Bryant once heard it. Shohei Ohtani will hear it now. Nothing 50-50 about it. A full-throated 100%.
